https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/449638035999686677/460489732959240212/example1.jpg

Author: Gateway#3763

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <TexWiller> Feedbacks or requests are very welcome!

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <karero> @TexWiller and you mentioned the difficulty goes hand in hand with the network hash rate, or something like that

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <VirtualSoundNW> The difficulty is a moving average that adjusts to get to a 1 block per minute rate.  If the hash rate increases the block rate goes up, then over several samples the higher rate will cause the difficulty to go up, slowing the rate back down towards 1/minute.  Decreases in network hash slow the rate, triggering a decrease in difficulty over multiple samples to speed it back up towards 1 per minute.
